column1: # Seed Alignment Data for Cross-lingual Entity Alignment
# 用途: 训练MTransE模型的种子对齐对
# Purpose: Seed alignment pairs for training MTransE model
# === 机器学习核心概念 (Machine Learning Core Concepts) ===
# === 深度学习概念 (Deep Learning Concepts) ===
# 覆盖: 法语 <-> 中文, 中文 <-> 英语, 法语 <-> 英语
# Coverage: French <-> Chinese, Chinese <-> English, French <-> English
